meanings.definition: A group of antibiotics derived from Penicillium fungi.
meanings.sent1: Doctors often prescribe penicillins to treat infections.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacist recommended penicillins for the patient's illness.
meanings.sent3: The penicillins in the medicine fought off the bacteria like tiny warriors.
meanings.sent4: Her recovery was as swift as if she had been injected with a dose of penicillins.
meanings.sent5: The effectiveness of penicillins in fighting infections is well-known.

meanings.definition: Any of various antibiotics obtained from molds of the genus Penicillium.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained how penicillins work to kill harmful bacteria.
meanings.sent2: The hospital stocked up on different types of penicillins for emergencies.
meanings.sent3: The moldy bread accidentally created a new batch of penicillins in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like penicillins, eradicating any doubts in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The discovery of penicillins revolutionized the field of medicine.
